embeds.title: Apply to Join Us!
embeds.description:
For your privacy during the hiring process, once you open a ticket it will direct you to an entirely private channel with an application to fill out that is not viewable by anyone but you and hiring staff. 

If you're interested in applying use the command `-ticket open <Character Name>` to start an application.

If you need help doing this process please tag <@149276780535087104> or <@200324488640987146>.

Commands to start the process can be posted here.
